thread.title: Exploring the citys busy network of streets and sights will be an adventure
thread.title_full: Exploring the citys busy network of streets and sights will be an adventure

author: Goviet nam-2015-10-15T06:20:26-0400
title: Exploring the citys busy network of streets and sights will be an adventure
text:
Travel Articles | October 15, 2015 
International Hotel is an ideal spot from which to discover Can Tho. The hotel lies 0.2 km from the city center and provides accessibility to important town facilities. For sightseeing options and loc... 
International Hotel is an ideal spot from which to discover Can Tho. The hotel lies 0.2 km from the city center and provides accessibility to important town facilities. For sightseeing options and local attractions, one need not look far as the hotel enjoys close proximity to Ho Chi Minh Museum, Ong Pagoda, Ninh Kieu Wharf.Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, International Hotel is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park. The ambiance of International Hotel is reflected in every guestroom. internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, wake-up service, desk, mini bar are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. The hotel's recreational facilities, which include sauna, massage, steamroom are designed for escape and relaxation. Whatever your reason for visiting Can Tho, the International Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away. Cuu Long Hotel contains a series of buildings, which contain 99 fully equipped rooms designed in Oriental and Western style, with professional staff and modern furniture. Located in the center of the city of Can Tho, the dynamic provincial capital of the Mekong Delta, it is in an ideal position with a large and secure car park.The Cuu Long Hotel has 5 kinds of rooms (Suite, Deluxe, Superior, Standard, and Economic) and includes karaoke, massage and a restaurant serving Vietnamese, Chinese and European Cuisine. The hotel can offer tour programs to floating markets, fruit gardens, a 130 year ancient house and other famous sights. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
